name: Air Hockey Fingertip Sports Lite
description:
Air Hockey Fingertip Sports Lite.

This is the FREE version supported by ads. A full version of the game is also available from the App Store with no ads.

New features include improved physics, a variety of puck/mallet sizes from tiny to giant, improved graphics, and a larger play area.

* Single Player mode versus the A.I. bot in Easy, Hard or Expert mode.
* Play same screen Two Player mode.
* Play-by-play action, a great soundtrack and crowd response.
* Settings are configurable in the Settings app (just touch the Silver Icon with the Gears on the Main screen)
* Gravity setting enables "TILT" detection and affects the motion of the puck.
* Sound setting can be turned off to listen to music while playing.
* For iPhone and iPod Touch.

Click-through ads are shown before and after the Lite version of this game. During a single player game, ads are shown only when the bot scores. So, it's possible, with a perfect 7-0 score, to play through a single player game with ads only at the beginning and end of the game. There is also a Full version of the game available in the app store with no ads.

The game has evolved with the help of player feedback. If you have any feedback about the game, please post it on the website (http://www.sealiongames.com) in the support forum.

Thanks for your support!

Sea Lion Games, Inc.
